answers.answer: Anyone? I'm in so much pain!!
I was diagnosed with preeclampsia today and they told me to watch out for headaches. Do you have them frequently?
oh sorry, I just read the rest of it. Tylenol and a shower, and call your OB or bring it up at your next appointment. Your bp may be elevated.

I get major headaches allday almost everyday too it gets so bad that i cant be in the room with noise lights nothing i even cover the windows with blankets but ive always had bad migranes its just worse since the pregnancy and i have no idea how to relieve it... sorry=/

I've been getting terrible migraines everyday lately they get so bad that they literally make my whole body hurt and make me throw up I don't know what to do about them I tried Tylenol and it doesn't help the only thing that usually helps is sleep but then when I wake up they are back! I feel like they will never go away! They hurt so bad I just want a few hours without them but I feel like that will never happen

question: Has anyone else had these headaches they are not horrible but they are not some little normal headache... I get them almost everyday and it hurts all the way down to my neck... Could it be stress i have been having a lot on my mind but i didn't think i was letting it get to me
title: can't be normal
